Summary: flat black triangle 20 feet thick x 80 feet long hovering and turning shadow of pilot
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving north on 309 on a rainy night. I saw object floating next to south bound lane about 30 or 40 ft above the ground turning back and forth.it was near ft.Washington.was going to stop.x wife started yelling Had to keep driving. Seemed to be unnoticed by other cars.
trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were no other sightings in Philadelphia on or around September 15th 1997
